acceptedAnswer.text: In addition to automating deployments, Chef allows for continuous delivery utilizing an ["Infrastructure as Code"](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Infrastructure_as_code) methodology, which can be key in any organization adopting [DevOps](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DevOps) principles.

mainEntity.name: What are the disadvantages to Chef?

acceptedAnswer.text: Historically, Chef's documentation has been lacking (but that has changed). Chef users who aren't familiar with coding (specifically Ruby) may encounter a steep learning curve.

mainEntity.name: Where can I learn about Chef in-depth?

acceptedAnswer.text: In-depth (and free) Chef training can be found at [learn.chef.io](https://learn.chef.io/).
